item.title: Martin Selbrede: Eschatological Universalism? A Deep Dive Into Postmillennialism And BB Warfield [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description: Chalcedon Foundation Vice-president Martin Selbrede discusses a host of topics including eschatological universalism, theonomy, Postmillennialism, BB Warfield and more
item.author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:summary: Martin Selbrede: Eschatological Universalism? A Deep Dive Into Postmillennialism and BB Warfield

item.title: Gabe Rench: Are Children Missionaries? The Apostle Paul and Postmillennialism, Christian Media [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description: Gabe "Waterboy" Rench of Crosspolitic  and the Fight Laugh Feast Network and Dr Josh Howard discuss various topics including Christian media and content, the FLF Conference and it's focus on families, children as missionaries in public schools, the role of eschatology in evangelism and more...
item.author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:summary: Gabe Rench: Are Children Missionaries? the Apostle Paul and Postmillennialism, Christian Media
